DOC.brief_title: The Microbiome Subfertility Assisted Reproductive Technologies ( ART )
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study learn microbial spectrum negatively positively impact IVF pregnancy outcome . This information need proceed next step adaptation microbiome attempt improve IVF outcome . The study expect shed light possible influence microbiome cause subfertility , endometrial receptivity obstetrical complication . A diagnostic link may find entity often unexplained today , e.g . ( recurrent ) miscarriage repeat implantation failure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Caucasian woman 2 . Women undergo invitro fertilization cycle ( first second time ) 3 . Single embryo transfer 4 . Day 5 embryo transfer 5 . Gonadotropinreleasing hormone antagonist 6 . Antimullerian hormone > 0,69 < 3,5 µg/L 7 . Body mass index ≤ 30 kg/m2 8 . Signed informed consent 1 . Women suffer chronic disease may impair pregnancy outcome ( e.g . diabetes , chronic renal disease ) . 2 . Antibiotics within 3 week sample 3 . Surgical sperm retrieval 4 . Invitro maturation 5 . Preimplantation genetic diagnosis 6 . Grade 3 4 endometriosis 7 . Patients unable comprehend investigational nature propose study
